definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: A watt is unit of electrical power .
It can meet the power demand of living room lighting.
sentences.chinese: 可以滿足一般家庭客廳照明用電功率需求，適應性廣。

sentences.english: It is shown that the electric power changes suddenly at the boundary between the electrode and the photo-sensitive area.
sentences.chinese: 指出在電極與光敏面交接處電功率發生躍變。

sentences.english: The voltage supplied and also the power when the current is 3A.
sentences.chinese: 當電流爲3A，電位差和電功率應是多少。

sentences.english: Find the electrical power dissipated in the lamp.
sentences.chinese: 找出燈泡所虛耗的電功率。
